titleStmt.title: Miscellaneous letters and essays on several subjects philosophical, moral, historical, critical, amorous, &c., in prose and verse : directed to John Dryden, Esq., the Honourable Geo. Granvill, Esq., Walter Moile, Esq., Mr. Dennis, Mr. Congreve, and other eminent men of th' age / by several gentlemen and ladies.
titleStmt.author: Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.
Moyle, Walter, 1672-1721.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
